pages.text: The Banana Kush Strain$(br2)Base THC: 21% $(br)Base CBD: 4% $(br)Effect: Sticky Icky
Banana Kush Weed can be obtained by grinding your Fresh or Dried buds in a Grinder machine or using the manual grinder.
Banana Kush Seeds can be planted on farmland or inside the Grow Pot
Banana Kush Extract can be gained through the DNA Process or by extracting Banana Kush Weed in an Extractor
You can package your banana kush weed for easier distribution or selling to the stoner villager.
